title: Still More Treasure Romans 5:1-11 (Martin Bragger)
content: A Peace Treaty Peace With God Danger – God At Work! A Golden Crown A Threshing Machine Tribulation Part Of The Journey No ‘Peace’ In The World Making Of The Christian Soldier A Fountain The Sign Of Love Bathed In The Fountain Of Love A Last Will & Testament Saved FROM Anger FOR Blessing Jesus Wrote Us In His Will The Spirit – Executor
